description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 23/4026/FUL dated 23/04/24 for 'Demolition of the existing building and redevelopment of the site to provide 149 residential units (Use Class C3) comprising three storey houses and flatted blocks up to four storeys. Provision of new pedestrian route and access link, private and communal amenity space, refuse and secure storage, 38 car parking spaces, 276 cycle parking spaces and sub-station.' Amendments include change to wording of condition 33 to read 'Notwithstanding the details shown in the drawings submitted and otherwise hereby approved, prior to the first occupation of the new dwelling houses (Use Class C3) permitted under this consent they shall all have been constructed to meet and achieve all the relevant criteria of Part M4(2) of Schedule 1 to the Building Regulations 2010 (or the equivalent standard in such measure of accessibility and adaptability for house design which may replace that scheme in future) - with the exception of level access to plots 68, 69, 70, 71, 72, 73, 74, 75 and 76; and 10% constructed to meet and achieve all the relevant criteria of Part M4(3) of the abovementioned regulations. The development shall be maintained as such in perpetuity thereafter.'
